tweet: IELE, a virtual machine with a universal language framework for translating and executing smart contracts, is in development to be deployed on the Cardano blockchain. Prof. Grigore Rosu, working with IOHK, presents the project in this video:  https://t.co/VB4n4ItcK2
I am going to look towards $TRX and $XVG, $ADA, $VEN, $POE, $ICX and $GVT for adds.
This month's roadmap update is published! You can click the "Updated" or "New" icons to see the updated changes. Check it out here:  https://t.co/LYr81Kdfjw

The next release of the Cardano roadmap is out, including updates on IELE virtual machine, Cardano stake pool registration, paper wallets and more. Check it out here:  https://t.co/t1kjKY09lk @CardanoStiftung @cardanocom #Cardano $Ada  https://t.co/XylDFPncxT

IELE, a virtual machine with a universal language framework for translating and executing smart contracts, is in development to be deployed on the Cardano blockchain. Prof. Grigore Rosu, working with IOHK, presents the project in this video:  https://t.co/CS9YNwNCNf

The Cardano #staking pool registration is live. Parties interested in running a stake pool in the Shelley testnet are invited to register, find out more about it here:  https://t.co/sbeVQrhiwV #Cardano $Ada #cryptocurrency  https://t.co/xMakQYWA2u

Interesting fact: If a cubic has three distinct REAL roots, then Cardano's formula will yield an expression with COMPLEX numbers. For instance, the root of x^3-15x-4=0 shown below is 4. If the roots are irrational, these real roots can ONLY be expressed using complex numbers.  https://t.co/ItblVzs6V8
